entry.title: Projects
entry.summary: Shutdown - Automatically parse banking data and allow users to search/sort/filter the now structured data. Couldn't make money.
entry.content:
Name Launch Date Status
jQuery slider Yii plugin 2012 Shutdown - Didn't materialize
ParseShuttingDown.com 2016 Shutdown - Easy script to migrate Parse to self hosted MongoDB app.
Improved Zeroda Kite 2017 Shutdown - Chrome extension, Ran for 2 years, Zerodha changed their Frontend source code to Vue.js thus shut it down.
Auto Twitter self block 2020 Didn't launch - Automatically block yourself from Twitter by mass unfollowing all your subscriber and resubscribing them after X days. Couldn't launch as Twitter had max threshold of 400 follows/unfollow per day.
ScanTheMarket 2020

Shutdown - Automatically parse banking data and allow users to search/sort/filter the now structured data. Couldn't make money.
Beamdock.com 2020 Shutdown - Got few paying customers, but failed to get enough traction.
GoalSlash 2022 Active - Personal project to track daily/weekly/monthly/quaterly/yearly goals. I'm more interested in visual charts, hence made this.
